title: Graphic Card/FPS
body: Hi, I recently bought Lenovo legion y520 which has Nivida GTX 1050 TI graphic card. I am just wondering what kind of FPS range should I normally be getting through out the game even in late team fight?

replies.body: I can't say for certain what FPS you should be hitting as there are a lot of other factors involved, but you should be running League pretty decently with that card as I actually have that in one of my laptops and it hits at the very least 120 on the regular. Have you been noticing any problems?
